amendment.description: Amendment reduces the amount made available for the EPA's State and Tribal Assistance Grants by $10 million and applies the amount to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 379 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce by $10,000,000 the Environmental Protection Agency, State and Tribal Assistance Grants account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 203 (Roll no. 65).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Reed amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 228 - 203 (Roll no. 65).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A038) offered by Mr. Reed.
